examples.example: 他积极乐观的态度给周围的人带来了很大的影响。

translate.english: His positive and optimistic attitude has a great influence on the people around him.

examples.example: 好的老师对学生的影响是深远而持久的。

translate.english: A good teacher has a profound and lasting influence on students.

examples.example: 父母的言传身教对孩子有着深远的影响。

translate.english: Parents' words and deeds have a profound influence on children.
